para.text: " shows how to configure RSS Bandit to use different XSLT Formatters to customize the look and feel of the Reading Pane. If you look in the RSS Bandit installation folder, you'll find a

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: folder that contains various XSLT files.
This folder contains the RSS Bandit Item formatting samples. If you start experimenting with these, ensure you use your own: copy/rename the interesting one, and change it to apply your needs.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:13pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: You should be familiar with XSLT to be able to get it work. The input of each XSLT stylesheet is a XML document fragment describing an RSS item. The root element will be an
